Name: Name
COPPPF: Check out our privacy policy first
WhatPPDoes: This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which GeoGuide collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from users.
PIIParagraph: We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when Users visit our site, fill out a form, and in connection with other activities, services, features, or resources we make available on our Site. Users may be asked for, as appropriate, name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and other personal information. Users may, however, visit our Site anonymously. We will collect personal identification information from Users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to supply personal identification information, except that it may prevent them from engaging in certain Site-related activities.
NPIIParagraph: We may collect non-personal identification information about Users whenever they interact with our Site. Non-personal identification information may include the browser name, the type of computer, and technical information about Users' means of connection to our Site, such as the operating system and the Internet service providers utilized and other similar information.
WBCParagraph: Our Site may use 'cookies' to enhance User experience.
AcceptPP: I have read and agree to Geo Guide's
Welcome Message: Welcome to Geo Guide â€“ your ultimate guide to exploring points of interest! This documentation will walk you through the various features and functionalities available on our website.
Exploring Points of Interest: Explore exciting points of interest displayed on the interactive map. Click on markers to reveal more details about each location.
Use the search: Use the search feature to find points of interest in specific regions. Enter the region name and discover fascinating places waiting to be explored.
Share your favorite: Share your favorite spots with the Geo Guide community:
Click to select a location: Click on the map to select a location.
Fill in the details: Fill in the details in the 'Add a Point Of Interest' form.
Click 'Add': Click 'Add' to add your point of interest to the map.
Click Update: Click 'Update' next to a POI to modify its details.
Click Delete: Click 'Delete' to remove a POI from your collection.
Access and edit: Access and edit your user profile:
Visit your profile page: Visit your profile page by clicking on the 'Profile' button.
Update your details: Update your username, email, and other details as needed.
Keep your account secure: Keep your account secure by changing your password regularly:
Visit change password: Visit the 'Change Password' section in your profile.
Enter your current password: Enter your current password and the new desired password.
Save changes: Save changes to update your password.
To logout from your profile: To logout from your profile page:
Click Logout: Click on the 'Logout' button on your profile page.
To Begin: To begin your Geo Guide journey, register for an account:
Provide neccessary: Provide the necessary registration details, including a unique username and a secure password.
Accept privacy policies: Accept the privacy policies to proceed.
Already account: Already have an account? Here's how to log in:
When ready: When you're ready to sign out:
Click Logout button: Click the 'Logout' button to end your session.
Click Delete Account: Click on 'Delete Account' and confirm your action.
Your account will be permanently deleted: Your account will be permanently deleted.
To delete your Geo Guide account: To delete your Geo Guide account:
